snippet.textDisplay: Okay I went to "like" the livestream and now I can't comment there?
snippet.textOriginal: Okay I went to "like" the livestream and now I can't comment there?

snippet.textDisplay: After a livestream finishes the video is usually available almost immediately though the comment section takes some number of minutes to become available after that.  It’s usually less than 15 minutes in my experience.  It’s not specific to this channel, it’s just how YouTube works.  Cheers!
